result.execSummary:
The defendant Edgar G Cavazos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to submit a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: 01:18 PM Defendant Edgar G Cavazos in court with attorney Heather Dvoran.  Defendant in custody. Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Edgar G Cavazos appeared by video means with Attorney from the Ozaukee County Jail.  Defendant does not qualify for public defendner.  Defendant wishes to resolve case today.  Court directs jail to bring Defendant to the courtroom.  Court goes off the record.  Court back on the record, without Atty Dvoran at 1:36 pm:  Court reviews charges with Defendant.  Court provides right to attorney waiver and plea questionnaire to defendant.  Defendant submits waiver of attorney.  Court examines the defendant as to the waiver.  Court accepts the waiver, finding it to be free and voluntary.  Defendant submits plea questionnaire and waiver.  Court examines the defendant as to the waiver.  Defendant enters no contest plea.  Court accepts the plea, finding it to be free and voluntary, and finds the defendant guilty as to their plea.  State makes recommendation as to sentencing.  Court renders judgment.
Per Dispatch, subject is in custody on warrant

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Matthew Edward Weil in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant not in court. Matter was scheduled for plea/sentencing. Counsel has not heard from defendant. State moves for warrant. Court issues warrant.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 6, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Attorney Matthew Edward Weil in court.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel appears by authorization.  Defendant was to appear for plea and sentencing, counsel was unable to contact the defendant.  Counsel indicates that the defendant may still be at inpatient facility receiving treatment.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 6, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
Authorization to Appear of Attorney Weil on behalf of the Defendant.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 12, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Edgar G Cavazos in court with attorney Matthew Edward Weil.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel files an authorization to appear and enters a Not Guilty plea.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 12, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Defendant provided a new mailing address during bail/bond hearing.  Stated he moved there in Feb. 2016.  Defendant completed and signed bail/bond sheet noting his old address on the bail sheet.
w/conditions: Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license.

Defendant Edgar G Cavazos appearing in custody by video from Ozaukee County Jail with attorney Rachel Alme Boaz.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel advises that the defendant does qualify for public defender representation.  Counsel will waive reading of complaint.  Court finds probable cause.  Counsel notifies court of defendants correct address.  State recommends $250 signature bond with conditions.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 5, 2016 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Edgar G Cavazos
Current: 301 S Butrick St, Waukegan, IL 60085 United States  (Effective: 05-26-2016)
Prior: 10839 W Cameron Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53225
Per Dispatch, subject is in custody on warrant
Defendant Edgar G Cavazos not in court. Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State recommends warrant. Court orders arrest warrant issued.
